TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit ActivityMetadata extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 表示由設定的 導入至執行環境的引數、子活動、變數及委派之集合。

span.span: Represents the set of arguments, child activities, variables, and delegates that a configured introduces to the execution environment.

span.span: The argument to add to the collection.

summary.span: 將引數加入至活動的引數集合。

span.span: Adds an argument to the collection of arguments of an activity.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddDefaultExtensionProvider<T> (Func<T> extensionProvider) where T : class;
.method public hidebysig instance void AddDefaultExtensionProvider<class T>(class System.Func`1<!!T> extensionProvider) cil managed
Public Sub AddDefaultExtensionProvider(Of T As Class) (extensionProvider As Func(Of T))
member this.AddDefaultExtensionProvider : Func<'T (requires 'T : null)> -> unit (requires 'T : null)

span.span: The type of the extension provider.
The function that returns the extension.

summary.span: 將指定的擴充提供者加入至活動預設擴充功能提供者的集合。

span.span: Adds the specified extension provider to the collection of default extension providers for the activity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果主機並未提供型別 `T` 的擴充，則會評估這個擴充提供者並為其提供。If the host does not provide an extension of type `T`, then this extension provider is evaluated to provide one.

summary.span: 將所指定活動新增至中繼資料的匯入子活動清單。

span.span: Adds the specified activity to the metadata's list of imported child activities.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddImportedChild(class System.Activities.Activity importedChild) cil managed

span.span: The activity to add.

summary.span: 將所指定活動新增至中繼資料的匯入子活動清單。

span.span: Adds the specified activity to the metadata's list of imported child activities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 匯入的子活動是不會由父活動直接排程的子活動，An imported child activity is a child activity that the parent activity does not schedule directly. 而是父系使用此活動設定的其他子活動。Rather, then parent uses this activity to configure some other child activity.

The origin.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 匯入的 是父活動不會直接叫用的 。An imported is an that the parent activity does not invoke directly. 父活動會使用此 設定其他子活動。Rather, the parent uses this to configure some other child activity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Imperative Code-Based 驗證](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/imperative-code-based-validation.md)。For more information, see [Imperative Code-Based Validation](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/imperative-code-based-validation.md).

summary.span: 將所指定變數新增至中繼資料的變數集合。

span.span: Adds the specified variable to the metadata's collection of variables.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddVariable(class System.Activities.Variable variable) cil managed

span.span: The variable to add.

summary.span: 將所指定變數新增至中繼資料的變數集合。

span.span: Adds the specified variable to the metadata's collection of variables.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法加入的變數會視為活動的公開可設定介面的一部分，也就是說，它們是由活動消費者所提供。Variables added using this method are considered part of the activity's publicly configurable surface, that is, they are to be provided by the consumer of the activity. 例如， 會使用這個方法，將變數加入至 集合。For example, adds the variables in its collection using this method. 活動的實作無法存取使用此方法加入的變數。An activity's implementation cannot access variables added using this method. 透過 加入的活動 (和任何其非實作子活動) 可以存取使用此方法加入的變數。Activities added through (and any of their non-implementation child activities) can access variables added using this method. 例如， 會使用這個方式加入其 集合。For example, adds its collection in this manner.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddVariable (System.Activities.Variable variable, object origin);
.method public hidebysig instance void AddVariable(class System.Activities.Variable variable, object origin) cil managed
public: void AddVariable(System::Activities::Variable ^ variable, System::Object ^ origin);

span.span: The variable to add.
The origin.

summary.span: 將所指定變數新增至中繼資料的變數集合。

span.span: Adds the specified variable to the metadata's collection of variables.
